plot: Marina goes to see her mother after work but, where is dad? A delightful and funny film based on a short story by Elvira Lindo.
title: Papá se ha ido
plot_es: Marina goes to see her mother after work but, where is dad? A delightful and funny film based on a short story by Elvira Lindo.
plot_en: Marina goes to see her mother after work but, where is dad? A delightful and funny film based on a short story by Elvira Lindo.
